item.title: Taming Diffusion Prior for Image Super-Resolution with Domain Shift SDEs
item.description: DoSSR: A novel SR model boosts efficiency by 5-7x, achieving state-of-the-art performance with only 5 sampling steps by cleverly integrating a domain shift equation into pretrained diffusion models.
